entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with a few showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
